text:
United Income | Brand New FinTech Startup | Full Stack Engineer - Node, Python, Math-Focused | Onsite in Washington, DC | Full Time

We all are coming from a very successful startup that exited about 2 years ago. We have a great team and are continuing to hire. Currently looking for a talented full stack engineer with a background/degree/passion in Math or Finance along with experience in Node and/or Python. Stack includes React, AWS (Serverless - API Gateway/Lambda), Node, Python, and more!

More information about us here:

* http://www.forbes.com/sites/janetnovack/2016/06/28/fintech-s...

* http://www.bizjournals.com/washington/blog/techflash/2016/06...

* http://dcinno.streetwise.co/2016/09/16/dc-tech-hellowallet-f...

Email david@unitedincome.com
